Title: Provides for a special district meeting for a school budget revote
Summary: Provides for a special district meeting for a school budget revote after the voters have defeated a budget at an annual meeting and election held June 9, 2020 pursuant to executive order number 202.26 of two thousand twenty.
ActClause: AN ACT to provide for a special district meeting for a school budget revote; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
